title: Ch4 My Transgender Kid 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.org
description:
My Transgender Kid

Health-Medical Documentary hosted by Gethin Anthony, published by Channel 4 in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/b/bc/My-Transgender-Kid-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

My Transgender Kid
Documentary about some of the youngest transgender people in Britain and the US as they and their families make life-changing decisions, beginning with two ordinary British families as they attempt to deal with the challenges of having a seven-year-old child who was born in the wrong gender. The parents are faced with difficult decisions, including whether to use `he' or `she' pronouns, and if they should let their children go to school with their new identity and risk bullying and judgement.
